name: SirKartMan
description:
-- SIR KARTMAN -- 

Its a common misconception that knights of old rode horses, (in fact the horse was not invented until the turn of the 13th century). In truth, these Knights rode none other than karts, enchanted by the mighty mighty wizard, Ser WhizardMan!!! 

His Wizardlyness himself has hand selected YOU to compete in a series of trials to prove your worth, in hopes of joining up amongst the ranks of the Kings Finest. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-3 unique tracks (Time Trials and Duel)

-Split Screen Multi-Player

-A kart-racing experience like no other *cough cough* (this has NEVER been done before) *cough* *cough*

-Multiple insulting medieval themed voice lines, perfect for ruining friendships.  

-Fun Soundtrack

-Karts

-Men 

-Men and Karts 

-Karts and Men
